page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN HARPUR HILL
page.content: { Unemployment in Britain as a whole is about 4 million. In Buxton the rate is about 10% and young people find it difficult to find jobs. However, one young man from Harpur Hill has hit upon a solution.{Lynton {Bennett}of Heathfield Nook was on the dole fo 2 years before he took advantage of the{Enterprise Allowance} which gave him{Â£1000}to start his own business and guaranteed him a wage of {Â£40}a week for the first year. This gave Lynton the chance to start selling vegetables in the streets near his home this summer. The unusual thing about Lynton's business is that he sells his green grocery from a horse and cart. He delivers on Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays and so far, has been very successful.
